sideProjects.title: Windoog Podcast
sideProjects.description: Created a low effort website and podcast feed for an Architecture podcast. All data hosted on Firebase with hooks to rebuild Netlify when data changes.

sideProjects.title: Arduino development
sideProjects.description: Multiple C++ projects for controlling synthesizers.

sideProjects.title: Aquaponics
sideProjects.description: Automation for aquaculture build with a Rasberry Pi and NodeJS

experience.description: Maintained and redesigned a Java-based (Play) web application. Ported some of the existing jQuery or React to LitElement (web components), developed some new functionality in LitElement to be usable within existing codebase.

Inventoried client needs and proposed fitting solutions. Created and managed implementation. Worked on a large variety of projects, some of them are highlighted below.
frontend developer
Quantum Inspire
Created an interface and client-side code parser for quantum computers.

Tradus
Created a marketplace for used heavy machinery. Worked with a multitude of templating languages and backends such as C# and Razor, Drupal and Twig, and Nunjucks

PowerPeers
Development of their public website using Umbraco as CMS

ABN AMRO
Created a tool for calculating loans for customers.

Pitched, designed and prototyped a new portal for students at the Delft
University of Technology, combining personalised study-related information from a plethora of different sources in a context-driven way.
Taught Master's students how to build a digital portfolio for themselves with HTML and CSS.
